io.reinert.requestor.core.auth

Class BasicAuth

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.reinert.requestor.core.auth.BasicAuth
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Auth, Base64Codec.Holder

    public class BasicAuth
extends Object
implements Auth, Base64Codec.Holder
    HTTP Basic Authentication implementation.
    Beyond username and password, this class accepts a withCredentials boolean, useful for CORS requests.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Detail

      • auth

        public void auth(PreparedRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: Auth

        Performs the logic for making the request authenticated, then dispatch the request.

        IMPORTANT: You must call request#send() after the auth has finished in order to dispatch the request, otherwise the request will never be sent.

        The request can be sent only once.

        Specified by:
        auth in interface Auth
        Parameters:
        request - The request about to be sent

      • setBase64Codec

        public void setBase64Codec(Base64Codec codec)
        Specified by:
        setBase64Codec in interface Base64Codec.Holder
